headline: Is American Electric Power (AEP) Fairly Priced After Recent Share Price Strength?
summary: If you are wondering whether American Electric Power Company stock is priced fairly today, you are not alone, especially with more investors looking for clearer signals on value in the utilities sector. The shares recently closed at US$120.08, with returns of 3.0% over 7 days, 4.9% over 30 days, 3.7% year to date, 27.0% over 1 year, 45.2% over 3 years, and 76.2% over 5 years, which gives plenty of numbers for valuation minded investors to weigh up.
